charaepi_ch0133_91_shilver/2301_1101_010:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] came across
Silver and Ho-Oh standing around by
themselves.
charaepi_ch0133_91_shilver/2301_1201_030:
This is where Ho-Oh and I became a
sync pair.
charaepi_ch0133_91_shilver/2301_1201_050:
I was just thinking about the path I’ve taken
with Ho-Oh...
charaepi_ch0133_91_shilver/2301_1201_060:
and why we were able to awaken my
arc suit.
charaepi_ch0133_91_shilver/2301_1201_070:
Now that I think about it, it was strange
how Ho-Oh and I met.
charaepi_ch0133_91_shilver/2301_1201_080:
I felt like I was being given a chance to
start over as a Pokémon Trainer.
charaepi_ch0133_91_shilver/2301_1201_090:
Until we met, I always thought Trainers
should be the ones to choose the Pokémon
they team up with.
charaepi_ch0133_91_shilver/2301_1201_100:
I thought if a Trainer were strong enough,
any Pokémon would follow and obey them.
charaepi_ch0133_91_shilver/2301_1201_110:
But in our case, Ho-Oh chose me. And now
we’re a sync pair.
charaepi_ch0133_91_shilver/2301_1201_120:
We battle as equals. Neither is superior to
the other.
charaepi_ch0133_91_shilver/2301_1201_130:
Through all our battles on Pasio, I’ve learned
that’s how sync pairs should be.
charaepi_ch0133_91_shilver/2301_1201_140:
As Trainer and Pokémon, we realized we
needed each other.
charaepi_ch0133_91_shilver/2301_1201_150:
I guess that’s why we were able to awaken
my arc suit.
charaepi_ch0133_91_shilver/2301_1201_160: If Ho-Oh sought a pure-hearted Trainer...
charaepi_ch0133_91_shilver/2301_1201_170:
I guess that means I fit the bill...at least
somewhat.
charaepi_ch0133_91_shilver/2301_1201_180:
Is that it? Do you really think my heart’s
pure?
charaepi_ch0133_91_shilver/2301_0402_220:
Hmph! You can wipe those smug looks off
your faces.
charaepi_ch0133_91_shilver/2301_1201_230:
Honestly, it’s hard to put into words what it
means to be pure-hearted.
charaepi_ch0133_91_shilver/2301_1201_250: All I can do is what I think is right.
charaepi_ch0133_91_shilver/2301_1201_260:
I’ll prove how pure-hearted I am by
becoming the world’s strongest sync pair.
